name: StoryCards
description:
A seed for SeedComp - a card-swiping storytelling game, inspired by Reigns and Lapse.

Based on a project from a previous game jam that has the potential to be expanded with

  • Authoring tool that allows easy review of authored flows, see sample wireframe in images
  • Support for states/cards that are not strictly positioned in the branching narrative, but rather act as optional/random story bits. Consider the kernel vs satellite events dichotomy with kernel elements already implemented and satellite ones to be added.
  • Game menu that allows navigating between the different stories. This could also be card-based, e.g. left for actions like next story and back, right for pick/choose story and confirm

The new project is meant to add features and improve story creation, see design doc.
